dict.acceptation: 训练；培养；（枪炮，摄影机等的）瞄准；整枝法；
训练，培养( train的现在分词)；教育；瞄准；整枝；

sent.orig: Make statistics training report periodically regarding training implementation status, training activity, attendance rate, training assessment result.
sent.trans: 定期做培训统计报告：培训执行情况，培训活动，培训出勤率，培训考核结果。

sent.orig: Such methods as relaxation training, self-suggestive training, simulation training, anti-disturbance training are often used.
sent.trans: 射击心理训练的常用方法有放松训练法、自我暗示训练法、模拟仿真训练法、抗干扰训练法等。

sent.orig: Operators skill training: skill survey, operation training, 5S and safety training and factory system training.
sent.trans: 生产一线人员的技能培训：能力的调查，技能培训，5S、安全培训，公司制度培训。

sent.orig: English language training to career personnel, collar individual English language training, English language training on employees.
sent.trans: 英语培训以职场人员，白领个人英语培训，企业员工英语培训为主。
